revision.comment: Created page with ''''TEXTMAP''' contains all the map data that a modder adds to an [[UDMF]] map in an [[level editor]], and replaces the [[THINGS]], [[VERTEXES]], [[LINEDEFS]], [[SIDEDEFS]] and [[â€¦'
revision.text:
'''TEXTMAP''' contains all the map data that a modder adds to an [[UDMF]] map in an [[level editor]], and replaces the [[THINGS]], [[VERTEXES]], [[LINEDEFS]], [[SIDEDEFS]] and [[SECTORS]] lumps from the binary [[map format]]s.
While the format is plain text, it is not advised to attempt editing it through a text editor rather than a specialized map editor. The format is legible enough to be parsed or created by various tools and scripting language (including {{wp|Perl}} or {{wp|PHP}}), but is mostly illegible for a human.
See [[Universal Doom Map Format]] for more information.
[[Category:Map lumps]]
